hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:Whenever Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) finished his `Asr prayer, he would enter upon his wives and stay with one of them. One day he went to Hafsa and stayed with her longer than usual

chapter.ara-name: باب دُخُولِ الرَّجُلِ عَلَى نِسَائِهِ فِي الْيَوْمِ
chapter.eng-name: If a man goes to all his wives in one day
